Question.Subject: How do you save a layout on pimp.myyearbook?
Question.Content: I sound like a total idiot because I've been doing these for a while but I made a layout it looks good and everything I just can't find the Save button or whatever button they use. This is the website: http://pimp.myyearbook.com/pimplayouteditor.php Thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer: Click (On Your Keyboard) Print Scrn and go to Paint. Then click ctrl v (paste) and up will come that screen. Then take your mouse and box the area you need, new paint window, ctrl v, and save.

Answer.Content: Click (On Your Keyboard) Print Scrn and go to Paint. Then click ctrl v (paste) and up will come that screen. Then take your mouse and box the area you need, new paint window, ctrl v, and save.
